bibl.seg: Pajón Leyra Irene, Artemidorus behind Artemidorus: Geographic Aspects in the Zoological Designs of the Artemidorus Papyrus. Avec résumé en anglais.
Jaś Elsner et al., New Studies on the Artemidorus Papyrus = Historia 61 (2012) pp. 336-357.

The Eighth book of Artemidorus' Geography in the zoological designs. - Traces of Artemidorus in the general title of the collection of animals? - Artemidorus as geographic model for the zoological figures.
